Module Cryptography
Package cryptography

Class Morse

java.lang.Object
cryptography.Cipher
cryptography.Morse
public class Morse
extends Cipher
This class represents the Morse cipher. This cipher does not extend from SubstitutionCipher simply because it does not use a concrete alphabet, as each character corresponds to a sequence of characters, rather than a single one. Encryption is done with a HashMap that links each character in the latin alphabet to a unique sequence of characters.
